text: (Atarku, attutar avarkalai nokki) ‘‘unkal mutataikalai ninkal etil kantirkalo ataivita nerana valiyai nan kontu vantirunta potiluma? (Unkal mutataikalai ninkal pinparruvirkal)'' enru kettarkal. Atarkavarkal ‘‘(am! Avarkalaiye nankal pinparruvatutan) ninkal kontu vantataiyum niccayamaka nankal nirakarikkirom'' enrum kurinarkal
